name: waitlisted.co
author: waitlisted.co

sections.description:
Install, configure, and add a short code. Thats all it takes to start your first waitlist.

Are you a product creator looking to start gathering users before launch. Sign up for waitlisted.co and get started today.

The wordpress plugin makes it easy to build a dynamic, engaging landing page with a few clicks.

Sign up at: https://www.waitlisted.co/
sections.installation:
Install the plugin via the zip.
Go to Settings -> Waitlisted.

Fill in your domain from waitlisted.co (yourapp.app.waitlisted.co)
Set the color for your waitlisted modal.
Enter the message you would like to show up when people share your site on social networks.

Follow the complete guide at: https://waitlisted.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/206930677-Installing-The-Plugin
sections.faq:
Do I need an external acocunt?

Yes. Read about the service and sign up at https://www.waitlisted.co

How Do I Use it on a page?

Place a [waitlisted] short code in your page wherever you want a call to action button to show up.

Change the text of the button with [waitlisted title=”Click me to join.”]
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Upgrade the modal embed to v2.

1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Make waitlist signups easy and fun. This a plugin that makes it simple to integrate http://waitlisted.co with wordpress.
